Ramsey Theory

DM
Dec 13, 2020

It deals with distribution of subsets of elements of sets.

Ramsey Number

DM
Dec 12, 2020

$R(m, n)$ where $m$ and $n$ are positive integers tells the minimum number of people at party such that their are $m$ mutual friends or $n$ mutual enemies.

Monte Carlo Algorithms

DM
Dec 10, 2020

Monte Carlo Algorithms give answers to Decision Problems. There is some probability that these answers are incorrect but it decreases as algorithm does more computations.
